DOC.brief_summary: [ 11C ] -dimethyl-diphenyl ammonium ( [ 11C ] -DMDPA ) - A Phase I , Open‑label , Safety Tolerability , Radiation Dosimetry , Biodistribution , First‑in-Human Study Novel 11C‑labeled Tracer Positron Emission Tomography Myocardial Perfusion Imaging
DOC.brief_title: A Phase I Study Novel Tracer Positron Emission Tomography `` PET '' Myocardial Perfusion Imaging `` MPI ''
DOC.criteria: body mass index ( BMI ) 18.0 30.0 kg/m2 good health write informed consent smoker subject receive medication blood transfusion 4 week prior screen positive alcohol blood test Subjects suffer claustrophobia Subjects clinically significant illness Subjects expose radiation within 12 month prior screen
